bug.author: LiteracyFanatic
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Tesseract Version: 5.0.0 Commit Number: b0e4608 Platform: Linux jordan-laptop 5.10.6-arch1-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT Sat, 09 Jan 2021 18:22:35 +0000 x86_64 GNU/Linux
<denchmark-h:h3>Current Behavior:</denchmark-h>
Since commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/commit/e1b9f1b446ceaef3825934596aa63981f6a69a12>e1b9f1b</denchmark-link> , tesseract builds correctly with but fails to install with . Installation works correctly when built with cmake though. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior:</denchmark-h>
make install works. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/files/5809282/configure.log>configure.log</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/files/5809272/make.log>make.log</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/files/5809273/make-install.log>make-install.log</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thank you for your report. This is fixed in commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/commit/7c5415a2c1c10fa3be9f25763e2300732d5e72e5>7c5415a</denchmark-link> .
